pointer: The unique selling point is shown in the variety of clothes worn by each boy and the can-do attitude along with the ability to question shown by the boy writing with a marker. The other boys follow the same example by grabbing a marker as well, pointing to peer influence of positive characteristics.
We know from the title that it’s an autumn & winter collection of 2017.
Playfulness is another element shown in the wearers of BOSS’ clothes. But it’s light and gentle, typical of human behavior.
The music impacts the lighting and the mood, regulated by an innocent kid who has no intentions as such.
The older boys play to seek attention, to be the best in the crowd. But ultimately, all the boys cooperate as a team indicated by the music fading into something suggestive of togetherness.
